name: C184 Deactivate the security PIN of the file using the right Sidebar
fullName: C184 Deactivate the security PIN of the file using the right Sidebar

steps.name: Given User should be on the Home web page
And User should be on the Main web page and signed as "Phantom user"
Given user must be in the "Files" section
And the available "Small" "SVG" file at the root with security PIN
uncaught exception TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'constructor')
assert [Check response status code is 200]: expected **200** to equal **200**
When user select the existing file
And user enters a valid PIN and confirms it
And user will turn "off" the PIN switch on the "Security" tab of the right sidebar
assert expected **<span.slider.round>** to have CSS property **background-color** with the value **rgb(214, 216, 225)**
